It offers 2 bhk and 3 bhk apartments in a built up area of 1020 sq ft. It has one balcony also inside it. Located at Horamavu in Bangalore which is 10 mins from ring road. It is very close to BBMP Office It provides modern amenities like swimming pool, gymnasium, children's play area, car parking facility, party hall,security systems and much more. It has a party hall which can be reserved for special occasions. It has lift facilities for the convenience of elder members of the family. It provides power back up facility, adequate supply of water and electricity. It also provides provision for TV and Telephone connections. DS Max Property is a well known real estate developers in Bangalore. It has been involved into construction from the past few years and has always believed in perfection. DS Max Property has created various residential projects in which many families are staying happily. It chooses the best architects and designers for their work so that they can provide maximum comfort and luxury to its residents. It performs its operations in diverse sections of the country. It is spread over Bangalore, Hosur, Vishakhapatnam, Ananthpur, Penukonda and Vizag. It has its sales and Marketing office in the United Arab Emirates and representative in the UK and the USA. DS Max Solitaire is its next project designed to achieve complete customer's satisfaction and render them peace and comfort with luxury.}
